home.MOTO: Test your Internet Service Provider(ISP) promises

report.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: We have stored your feedback and it will show up in our analysis shortly.

graph.HELP: This graph presents instantenous upload and download rate of your connection agains diffrent test servers. Usually closer server yeilds to higher speed.

how.STEP_1_DETAIL: First step is to find the closest NDT servers to your location. Generally this is done with a call to AppEngine; a service owned by Google. But this service is blocked in a few countries...
how.STEP_2_DETAIL: In the second step, multiple calls are sent to each of the servers to measure upload and download speed as well as many other metrics regarding the quality of the service...
how.STEP_3_DETAIL: When the results of all three servers are received, an average of the upload and download speed and latency will be shown and stored and the calclauted results of the test..
how.STEP_4_DETAIL: Every test result is saved in a large database with all the metrics regarding the location, price, ISP and customer reviews, this informaiton is later used in the analysis...

regional.TITLE: Average Regional Speed
regional.TITLE_SMALL: Service report of this year (updated 1 hour ago)

pieChart.TITLE: Unfiltered Tests Rate
pieChart.HELP: This chart shows the percentage of filtered data versus total available data.

barChart.TITLE: Unfiltered Test vs Total
barChart.HELP: This chart shows you how many data are filtered with the bars on the map.

uploadHistogram.TITLE: Upload Rates Histogram
uploadHistogram.HELP: This chart demonstrate the distribution of upload data on the map, use the filter bars on the map to see the results.

downloadHistogram.TITLE: Download Rates Histogram
downloadHistogram.HELP: This chart demonstrate the distribution of download data on the map, use the filter bars on the map to see the results.

contact.HEADING: Contact Us
contact.DESC: For any inquiries regarding the platform setup and development, accuracy of analytics and reports or any issues feel free to contact us. One of our team members will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
